Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29442512]MERS-CoV:inhibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(EC50=7.14 ± 0.7 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits MERS-CoV infection and its spike (S) protein-mediated cell–cell fusion.

Literature.Title: Discovery of Hydrocarbon-Stapled Short α-Helical Peptides as Promising Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV) Fusion Inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Wang C, Xia S, Zhang P, Zhang T, Wang W, Tian Y, Meng G, Jiang S, Liu K.
